html:
Vertical Relevance Achieves AWS DevOps Competency Status

Vertical Relevance (VR), a financial services-focused consulting firm, announced today that it has achieved Amazon Web Services (AWS) DevOps Competency status. Vertical Relevance was built to help Financial Services institutions design and deliver effective transformation programs across people, processes, & systems. This designation by AWS recognizes Vertical Relevance’s expertise in enabling customers to effectively utilize AWS and deliver application functionality to customers quickly and efficiently.

Achieving AWS DevOps Competency differentiates Vertical Relevance as an AWS Partner Network (APN) member that provides specialized technical proficiency and proven customer success in delivering DevOps solutions on AWS. To receive the designation, APN Partners must possess deep AWS expertise and deliver solutions seamlessly on AWS.

“VR is proud to achieve the AWS DevOps Competency status,” said Robert Summers, Managing Partner and Co-Founder at Vertical Relevance. “Our team is dedicated to helping financial services institutions achieve their business goals by leveraging the agility, breadth of services, and pace of innovation that AWS provides.”

“We focus on building a solid foundation for customers that provides AWS accounts, pipelines, environments, and dashboards via self-service,” said Hemant Jaiswal, Managing Partner at Vertical Relevance. “This allows application teams to focus on continuing to develop business functionality with increased speed to production.”

As an AWS DevOps Competency Partner, Vertical Relevance focuses on driving continuous innovation on AWS. Vertical Relevance is focused on enabling their financial services customers to successfully operate on AWS while continuously upskilling their capabilities with the rapid pace of innovation.

AWS is enabling scalable, flexible and cost-effective solutions from startups to global enterprises. To support the seamless integration and deployment of these solutions, AWS established the AWS Competency Program to help customers identify Consulting and technology APN Partners with deep industry experience and expertise. For more information about Vertical Relevance’s DevOps services, visit

https://www.verticalrelevance.com/services/cloud-transformation/

About Vertical Relevance

Vertical Relevance was founded to help business leaders drive value through the design and delivery of effective transformation programs across people, processes, and systems. Our mission is to help Financial Services firms at any stage of their journey to develop solutions for success and growth. To learn more visit, www.verticalrelevance.com.

View source version on businesswire.com: https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20211129005088/en/
